+ Meanwhile, in a parallel Foundation scp...

Dive into short comics exploring fun and unexpected "what if" scenarios with SCPs. Just a lighthearted take on the strange and impossible! ;)

[[toc]]

[[div style="border: 2px solid #ff0000; background-color: #222222; padding: 10px;"]]

[[/div]]
[[div style="background-color: #000000; color: #ffffff; padding: 10px;"]]
